title: Pumpkin Icon
body: I have a question about the Pumpkin Icon. I know it will be a few more days until I get it, but I just wanted to make sure if I will get it if I gifted a friend a champion during the Teemoing.

replies.body: If you sent a gift, then you should be good for an icon.  The icons should be finished distributing by the 17th.  If you have any concerns about eligibility, feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can clarify individually.  Hope that helps!
Alright thank you! I just wanted to make sure if gifting a champion would count. Well, now all I have to do is wait for the icon then. :)
